title: The Second Amendment Debate
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Second Amendment Debate.

hook.text: Twenty-seven words have fueled over two centuries of legal battles. The Second Amendment is America's most debated.

buildup.text: 'A well regulated Militia, being necessaryâ€¦the right of the people to keep and bear Arms, shall not be infringed.'

discovery.text: For decades, courts read this as protecting state militias. In 2008, that interpretation flipped.

twist.text: District of Columbia v. Heller declared an individual right to own firearms for self-defense at home.

climax.text: But Heller also said the right isn't unlimitedâ€”government can still regulate dangerous weapons.

punchline.text: The right to bear arms exists. Its boundaries are still being drawn.

quiz.question: What did District of Columbia v. Heller establish?
options: An individual right to firearms for self-defense
